settings.intro_text: All Caco America LLC products are inspected and tested to ensure quality before leaving the factory. If you are not satisfied with your Caco America LLC product, please contact us within 30 days of receiving it atsales@cacoamerica.com to return it free of charge for a replacement or to receive a full refund. The choice is yours.
settings.non_electric_warranty_text: Each Caco America LLC non-electric product is warranted to be free of defects in material and workmanship for as long as the consumer owns the product.
settings.non_electric_coverage_text: Warranty does not cover normal wear and tear, environmental factors, accidental damage, or misuse.
settings.non_electric_discretion_text: At Caco America LLC's discretion, a defective product will be repaired or replaced.
settings.electric_warranty_text: Each Caco America LLC electric product is warranted to be free of defects in material and workmanship for one (1) year from the date of original purchase.
settings.electric_coverage_text: Warranty does not cover normal wear and tear, abuse, altered products, modifications, or repairs performed by anyone other than Caco America LLC.
settings.electric_discretion_text: At Caco America LLC's discretion, a defective product will be repaired or replaced.
settings.legal_rights_text: This warranty gives you specific legal rights, which may vary based on your local jurisdiction.
settings.electric_contact_text: If you have issues with your Caco America LLC electric product, please contact us at sales@cacoamerica.com. Our customer care team will assist you and start the (free) process to determine whether your product is defective.
settings.warning_text: Important: Manufacturer's warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors such as product use, point of purchase, or reseller status.
settings.conditions_text_1: Caco America LLC's warranty applies only to products purchased directly from Caco America LLC, an authorized distributor, vendor, or reseller.
settings.conditions_text_2: Products purchased through unauthorized sources are not covered.
settings.conditions_text_3: Proof of purchase is required to obtain warranty service.
settings.distributors_text: Contact us for information about authorized distributors in your area.

settings.title: Track Your Order
settings.subtitle: Enter your order details below to track your shipment
settings.error_message: Please enter a valid order number
